about: Holder of a Master’s degree in computer science, I worked as a fullstack web developer for 9 years for big companies (Société Générale, AXA, Vinci...). During these missions, I was able to analyze the functional needs of my clients, choose technical solutions, then design and carry out the development of the desired web applications until its deployment. I am now very interested in blockchain development and this is where I want to improve.

list.description: Fullstack development of B2B applications on the SG Market platform
tasks: Fund Alerts: real-time alert service to inform fund managers of major movements in their assets (redemption, subscription), according to criteria that the fund manager will have defined himself, depending his priorities and the characteristics of his portfolio.

ETF Link: support service for ETF issuers. Placement of redemption/subscription orders by Authorized Participants, then validation by the Asset Manager. Management of ETF activity on the primary market. History and reporting.

list.description: Migration of a portfolio of AXA applications to Azure PaaS, in the Microsoft consulting team.
tasks: Transformation of .NET and Node.js applications already in production to make them compatible with deployment on Azure.
App Services, Key vault, Application Insights, Cache Redis, Blob Storage.

list.description: Web application for construction site supervisors. Budget management (scores, invoices, etc.)
tasks: Tech lead of a team of 4 junior developers.

list.description: Web application for managing financial savings for operational or strategic users of the Banque Populaire and Caisse d'Epargne networks.
Web application for recruiters intended to offer technical and functional tests to candidates as interactive surveys.

Development of two internal company applications: a CRM (relationship management with Airbus and suppliers), and an application for managing the design and production of electrical harnesses for Airbus aircrafts.
tasks: Design and development of evolutions, process automation and maintenance
Used by a hundred people within the LATECOERE group in France, Germany, Tunisia, Turkey and Mexico.

list.description: End-of-study internship: End-to-end development of a Windows Phone application for playing and sharing multimedia content as part of a Home Networking system, in collaboration with LabRI (Bordeaux computer science research laboratory).
2nd year internship in the programming language laboratory: Optimization of Plasma, a MapReduce framework written in OCaml.
tasks: Interpretation and reading of scientific articles
Analysis of the source code of the Hadoop framework written in Java
Implemented sorting by keys and hash values

list.description: Option Parallelism, Regulation and Distributed Calculation.
Intensive two-year study course (Math and Physics) preparing for the competitive entrance examinations to the French ‘Grandes Écoles’ (the top French and highly-selective institutions)
